BANNER.DETAIL: Learn to start a business in just 54 hours, meet the best mentors, investors, co-founders and sponsors who are ready to help you get started. Your community is here to support you.

ABOUT.TITLE: What is Startup Weekend?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: is a global movement, a 54-hour weekend event that brings together innovators, entrepreneurs, creators, developers, startup enthusiasts, designers and more to launch ideas and form teams to develop a startup during the course of a weekend. On the last day (Sunday), participants give their final pitch at a panel of judges that determines the winners.
ABOUT.PLACE: Place: Main auditorium of the Society of Engineers of Bolivia (SIB)

MORE_DETAILS.TITLE: Why "Startup Weekend Women"?
MORE_DETAILS.FIRST_PARAGRAPH: We want to continue making efforts to cultivate a totally inclusive community. A key component of that vision is to empower women to pursue their dreams and build tools that change the world.
MORE_DETAILS.SECOND_PARAGRAPH: We believe that by creating the right environments, programs and initiatives, women in technology (along with their larger community) are better positioned to drive transformative change in their community and beyond.

INFO.TITLE: Register your info
INFO.FIRST_PARAGRAPH: We need your info and an image of your proof of payment.
INFO.SECOND_PARAGRAPH: Fill the form. Tell us who you are, what do you do, and what are your expectations of the event.
INFO.THIRD_PARAGRAPH: You are just one step away of being part of the Startup Weekend experience.

THANKS.FIRST_PARAGRAPH: Thanks for acquiring your ticket! We can't wait to see the amazing things you are going to do! See you at the event!
